about_the_game:
City Car Driving 2.0 is a realistic car simulator that will help novice drivers master basic car driving skills in conditions as close to reality as possible.

Artificial intelligence monitors compliance with traffic rules, player behavior on the road, which helps to consolidate practical skills and theoretical knowledge of traffic rules.

Cars physical model realism and dynamic weather conditions provide a deep immersion in the World, challenging even experienced drivers.


KEY FEATURES
• Elaborated game controls that include both manual and automatic gearbox, and end-to-end driver preparation
• Player’s car customization
• Choice of common vehicle types
• Car simulator physics and ambient sounds as realistic as possible
• Dynamically changing times of the day and weather conditions
• Diverse environment for exploration: city, forest, etc.
• Numerous game modes
